title: Impact Assessment Survey
description: Evaluate the social impact of your organization's programs and initiatives

intro_text.title: Social Impact Assessment Survey
intro_text.description: This survey is designed to help your organization assess and document the social impact of your programs and initiatives. The information collected will be used to evaluate effectiveness, identify areas for improvement, and communicate your impact to stakeholders. Please provide detailed and honest responses to help us understand the full scope of your work and its impact on the communities you serve.

survey_purpose.title: Purpose of this Assessment
survey_purpose.description:
The data collected through this survey will help:
• Measure the effectiveness of your programs
• Identify strengths and areas for improvement
• Document outcomes for reporting to funders and stakeholders
• Inform strategic planning and program development
• Share impact stories and best practices

respondent_title.title: Your Title/Position
respondent_title.description: Please enter your title or position within the organization

organization_name.title: Organization Name
organization_name.description: Please enter the full name of your organization

organization_type.title: Organization Type
organization_type.description: Please select the type that best describes your organization

organization_mission.title: Organization Mission
organization_mission.description: Please provide your organization's mission statement

years_operating.title: Years in Operation
years_operating.description: How long has your organization been operating?

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: What is the geographic scope of your organization's work?

focus_areas.title: Focus Areas
focus_areas.description: What are your organization's primary focus areas? (Select all that apply)

staff_size.title: Staff Size
staff_size.description: How many paid staff members does your organization have?

annual_budget.title: Annual Operating Budget
annual_budget.description: What is your organization's annual operating budget?

program_name.title: Program/Initiative Name
program_name.description: Please enter the name of the specific program or initiative you are assessing

program_description.title: Program Description
program_description.description: Please provide a detailed description of this program or initiative

program_goals.title: Program Goals
program_goals.description: What are the primary goals and objectives of this program?

program_status.title: Program Status
program_status.description: What is the current status of this program?

target_population.title: Target Population
target_population.description: Who is the target population or beneficiary group for this program?

program_activities.title: Key Activities
program_activities.description: Please describe the key activities and services provided through this program

program_funding.title: Program Funding Sources
program_funding.description: What are the funding sources for this program? (Select all that apply)

people_served.title: Number of People Served
people_served.description: How many people has this program directly served in the past year?

services_provided.title: Number of Services/Activities
services_provided.description: How many services, activities, or events were provided through this program in the past year?

primary_outcomes.title: Primary Outcomes
primary_outcomes.description: What are the primary outcomes that have been achieved through this program?

outcome_evidence.title: Outcome Evidence
outcome_evidence.description: What evidence do you have that demonstrates these outcomes? Please be specific about data collected.

data_collection_methods.title: Data Collection Methods
data_collection_methods.description: What methods do you use to collect impact data? (Select all that apply)

impact_stories.title: Impact Stories
impact_stories.description: Please share 1-2 specific stories that illustrate the impact of your program on individuals or communities

impact_rating.title: Overall Impact Rating
impact_rating.description: On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate the overall impact of this program?

beneficiary_feedback_methods.title: Beneficiary Feedback Methods
beneficiary_feedback_methods.description: How do you collect feedback from program beneficiaries? (Select all that apply)
options: We don't currently collect beneficiary feedback

satisfaction_level.title: Satisfaction Level
satisfaction_level.description: Based on feedback, what is the overall satisfaction level of beneficiaries with your program?

positive_feedback.title: Positive Feedback
positive_feedback.description: What positive feedback have you received from beneficiaries about this program?

constructive_feedback.title: Constructive Feedback
constructive_feedback.description: What constructive feedback or suggestions for improvement have you received from beneficiaries?

testimonial.title: Beneficiary Testimonial
testimonial.description: Please share a powerful testimonial from a program beneficiary (with permission)

challenges_faced.title: Challenges Faced
challenges_faced.description: What significant challenges or obstacles has this program faced?

challenge_types.title: Types of Challenges
challenge_types.description: What types of challenges has the program faced? (Select all that apply)

challenge_response.title: Response to Challenges
challenge_response.description: How have you addressed or overcome these challenges?

lessons_learned.title: Lessons Learned
lessons_learned.description: What are the key lessons learned from implementing this program?

future_plans.title: Future Plans
future_plans.description: What are your plans for this program in the next 1-3 years?

planned_changes.title: Planned Changes
planned_changes.description: What changes do you plan to make to the program? (Select all that apply)

resources_needed.title: Resources Needed
resources_needed.description: What additional resources would help you improve or expand this program? (Select all that apply)

sustainability_plan.title: Sustainability Plan
sustainability_plan.description: What is your plan for ensuring the long-term sustainability of this program?

additional_comments.title: Additional Comments
additional_comments.description: Please share any additional information about your program's impact that wasn't covered in previous questions

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Thank you for completing this impact assessment survey. Your responses will help us better understand the impact of your program and identify opportunities for improvement and growth. We will analyze the information provided and share a summary report with you.
